contentAbout.description: I am a website developer with a passion for adding value to every project. Together, let's transform ideas into extraordinary digital realities.

I attended elementary school at Bakti Jaya, middle school at Al-Inayah Islamic boarding school, vocational high school at Sasmita Jaya 1, and I am currently in my fourth semester at Pamulang University.

contentAbout.heading2: of knowledge and striving for excellence.
contentAbout.description: Currently, I am exploring my creative potential in website development, applying the knowledge I have acquired, and constantly seeking fresh inspiration to meet the challenges of future evolution.

contentAbout.heading2: excellence in every endeavor I undertake.
contentAbout.description: As of now, web development has become my avid interest. Hence, I am eagerly taking this chance to cultivate intriguing websites, turning my passion into a fulfilling hobby.

I reside in the city of South Tangerang, precisely in Bakti Jaya district, on Permata Pamulang Street. I was born on October 5, 2002. Currently, I am not employed, but I work as a martial arts coach near my home.
